mapper.command:
select pc.id as pc_id, sc.id as sc_id
from public.person_conversation pc
join public.system_conversation sc
on pc.id_conversation = sc.id_conversation
WHERE pc.address = '{{var.input.person_address}}'  and sc.id_channel = {{3.id}}
limit 1
